Packages in the Wild

Source: vignettes/packages-in-the-wild.Rmd
packages-in-the-wild.Rmd

We plan for this section to expand over time. Please let us know1 if you’d like your litr-knitted package to appear here.

Package name Description Rmd source file Generated html Generated R package
jsm2023 Navigate the JSM program from the comfort of an R console create-jsm2023.Rmd create-jsm2023.html jsm2023/
jsm2022 Navigate the JSM program from the comfort of an R console create-jsm2022.Rmd create-jsm2022.html jsm2022/
rleastsquares Perform least squares (a package coded in a live demo) create-rleastsquares.Rmd create-rleastsquares.html rleastsquares/
independencepvalue Test independence between groups of Gaussian variables create-indepe…Rmd create-indepe…html independencepvalue/
cssr Cluster stability selection index.Rmd bookdown cssr/
